attributes.action: Include in the 2011 Census the DNA of every man, woman and child in the United Kingdom.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We also request that he recommends this to the other countries of the EEC.We believe that this would identify kidnapped children and adults who have been trafficked and return them to their families, even though they have no recollection of their true identity. We would like a Government Department devoted to helping these lost children. This is a matter of great urgency and importance.

rejection.details: Parliament has already approved the Census (England and Wales) Order 2009: http://www.opsi.gov.uk/si/si2009/draft/ukdsi_9780111486535_en_1
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
